author: WULFF DEN
description:
Head to http://drinktrade.com/wulffden to get 50% off your first month of coffee AND 10% off gifts

We've got another "best PC handheld" contender, but does it really count if the price is prohibitively expensive? With a beautiful large OLED screen and a Z2 Extreme chip and a healthy sprinkling of Windows jank, it doesn't get much better than this...
